resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: A hearty mix of 6 cups of torn iceberg lettuce, 2 medium tomatoes, chopped, 1 medium ripe avocado, peeled and chopped, 3/4 cup diced fully cooked ham, 2 hard-boiled large eggs, chopped, 3/4 cup diced cooked turkey, 1-1/4 cups sliced fresh mushrooms, and 1/2 cup crumbled blue cheese. Topped with your favorite salad dressing and optional sliced ripe olives and lemon wedges . This salad is packed with 52g of proteins, 800 calories, and 230 carbs

Fresh mixed greens topped with diced chicken breast, crisp bacon, hard-boiled egg, avocado, tomatoes, blue cheese crumbles, and your choice of dressing. This salad is rich in proteins with 45g, providing 700 calories and 30g of carbs.

A refreshing blend of cooked quinoa, diced cucumbers, cherry tomatoes, red onion, Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese. Drizzled with a lemon-herb vinaigrette, this salad offers 18g of proteins, 400 calories, and 45g of carbs.

A classic combination of crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, bell peppers, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese. Tossed in a Greek vinaigrette, this salad provides 12g of proteins, 300 calories, and 20g of carbs.

Bell peppers stuffed with a mix of ground turkey, quinoa, black beans, corn, diced tomatoes, and spices. Baked until tender. This meal offers 25g of protein, 350 calories, and 30g of carbs per serving.
Seasoned ground beef served in taco shells with toppings like lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, and salsa. This meal provides 20g of protein, 400 calories, and 30g of carbs.
